alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County Including Shasta Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 19 at 7:34PM PDT until July 19 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...Gusty Winds and Low Humidity... .Gusty afternoon and evening winds combined with very dry humidity levels will result in critical fire weather conditions in portions of Siskiyou and Modoc this afternoon, Wednesday, and possibly Thursday. ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR STRONG GUSTY WIND WITH LOW RH FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 281... Red flag conditions are becoming more isolated as winds begin to ease and humidities recover. Therefore this warning will be allowed to expire at 8 PM PDT.

area.areaDesc: Central Siskiyou County Including Shasta Valley
